issues.description: Activity tab placeholder - shows 'Activity log coming soon' with no implementation
issues.code_snippet:
{activeTab === 'activity' && (

Recent Activity

Activity log coming soon

)}
issues.recommended_fix: Implement activity log by creating an API endpoint at /api/orchestrators/[id]/activity that fetches audit logs, task updates, and status changes. Display as a timeline with filtering options.

issues.description: Agents tab placeholder - shows 'Agent management coming soon' with no implementation
issues.code_snippet:
{activeTab === 'agents' && (

Managed Agents

{vp.agentCount} agents

Agent management coming soon

)}
issues.recommended_fix: Implement agent management by creating an API endpoint at /api/orchestrators/[id]/agents to list, add, and remove agents. Include agent status, capabilities, and performance metrics.

issues.description: API key rotation endpoint mismatch - hook calls /api/orchestrators/:id/rotate-key but actual endpoint is /api/orchestrators/:id/api-key (POST)
issues.recommended_fix: Change the endpoint in the hook from `/api/orchestrators/${id}/rotate-key` to `/api/orchestrators/${id}/api-key` and update response parsing to match the actual API response structure which returns { data: { apiKey, name, scopes, ... }, message, warning }

issues.description: Response parsing mismatch - API returns { data: Orchestrator } but hook expects Orchestrator directly
issues.recommended_fix: Update line 112 to parse the nested response: `const { data } = await response.json(); setVP(data);` - API consistently returns { data: ..., message?: ... } structure

issues.description: Response parsing mismatch in useVPs hook - API returns { data: VP[], pagination: {...} } but hook expects { orchestrators?: VP[] }
issues.recommended_fix: Update to match actual API response: `const { data, pagination } = await response.json(); setVPs(data || []);` - Also consider storing pagination metadata for UI pagination controls

issues.description: Response parsing inconsistency in createVP - expects Orchestrator directly but API returns { data: VP, message: string }
issues.recommended_fix: Update to parse nested response: `const { data } = await response.json(); return data;`

issues.description: Response parsing inconsistency in updateVP - expects Orchestrator directly but API returns { data: VP, message: string }
issues.recommended_fix: Update to parse nested response: `const { data } = await response.json(); return data;`

issues.description: TODO comment - audit logging not implemented for API key generation
issues.recommended_fix: Implement audit logging by creating an AuditLog entry with action='API_KEY_GENERATED', actorId=session.user.id, targetId=vpId, metadata={ name, scopes, expiresAt }

positive_findings.description: Comprehensive API endpoints implemented for Orchestrator CRUD operations with proper authentication, authorization, and validation
Robust Zod schema validation for all API inputs with detailed error messages
API key hashing using SHA-256, stored securely with only hash in database
Well-implemented Orchestrator analytics service with trend analysis, metrics calculation, and time-range support
Comprehensive filtering, search, and sorting capabilities on Orchestrator list page with real-time updates
Consistent error handling with proper HTTP status codes and user-friendly error messages
Skeleton loaders and loading spinners implemented for good UX during data fetching
Strong TypeScript typing throughout with proper interfaces and type guards

immediate_priority.action: Fix API response parsing mismatches in use-vp.ts hooks
immediate_priority.impact: Critical - Orchestrators list and details pages are currently broken
Critical - API key rotation feature is non-functional

short_term.impact: High - Users cannot track Orchestrator activity history
requirements: Design ActivityLog database table or use existing audit logs
Add filtering by event type and date range

short_term.impact: High - Users cannot manage Orchestrator agents
requirements: Build AgentList component with add/remove capabilities

medium_term.action: Add audit logging for sensitive Orchestrator operations
medium_term.impact: Medium - Important for compliance and security

medium_term.action: Add pagination controls to Orchestrator list UI
medium_term.impact: Medium - Currently shows all VPs, will have performance issues at scale

nice_to_have.action: Add real-time Orchestrator status updates using WebSocket
nice_to_have.impact: Low - Would improve UX for monitoring active VPs
Low - Would help users optimize Orchestrator allocation

testing_recommendations.description: Add tests for API response parsing in all use-vp.ts hooks
Add Playwright tests for Orchestrator list, detail, creation, and status toggle flows
Expand API test coverage for edge cases in Orchestrator endpoints

architecture_notes.observation: Mismatch between API response structure and frontend expectations
architecture_notes.recommendation: Create a shared API response type contract in @neolith/core to ensure consistency

architecture_notes.observation: No centralized API client or response parsing logic
architecture_notes.recommendation: Consider creating an API client wrapper that handles response parsing, error handling, and type safety

architecture_notes.observation: Analytics service is well-designed but could benefit from caching
architecture_notes.recommendation: Add Redis caching for Orchestrator metrics to reduce database load

architecture_notes.observation: API key storage in Orchestrator capabilities JSON field is non-standard
architecture_notes.recommendation: Consider creating a separate APIKey table with proper relations for better querying and management
